headline: Should Amphenol’s Record‑Beating Q4 and Higher Guidance Driven by AI Connectivity Demand Require Action From APH Investors?
summary: Amphenol recently reported a very strong fourth quarter and full-year performance, with revenues and adjusted diluted EPS surpassing the high end of its own guidance and analysts’ expectations, and it presented these advances to customers and engineers at DesignCon 2026 in Santa Clara, California. The company’s record sales, standout growth within the electronic components and manufacturing group, and higher‑than‑expected forward guidance underline how demand for its high-speed interconnect...
